docs.title: Prerequisite
docs.text:
pip3 install --user empy pip3 install --user toml pip3 install --user numpy pip3 install --user jinja2

sudo apt install libgstreamer1.0-dev -y sudo apt install gstreamer1.0-plugins-good -y sudo apt install gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad -y sudo apt install gstreamer1.0-plugins-ugly -y

docs.title: Update Packages
docs.text:
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade

cat /etc/apt/sources.list ls -lt /etc/apt/sources.list.d/

docs.title: Error in update
docs.text:
wget -O - http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo.key | sudo apt-key add - E: The repository 'http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable jammy InRelease' is not signed.

cat /etc/apt/sources.list.d/gazebo-stable.list deb [trusted=yes] http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable jammy main

docs.title: PX4_SITL Guide
docs.text:
Step 1: Install PX4 setup git clone https://github.com/PX4/PX4-Autopilot.git --recursive

make clean; make distclean; bash ./Tools/setup/ubuntu.sh

Step 2: Install Gazebo 11 cd ~ curl -sSL http://get.gazebosim.org | sh

sudo apt install aptitude sudo aptitude install libgazebo-dev

Step 3: Run PX4 + Gazebo 11 [Run gazebo] cd PX4-Autopilot

make clean; make distclean; bash ./Tools/setup/ubuntu.sh make px4_sitl gz_x500

OR

Step 3: Run PX4 + JMavsim ls -l /usr/lib/jvm/java--openjdk-amd64/bin/java

export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH make px4_sitl jmavsim

Step 4: Install QGroundControl sudo usermod -a -G dialout $USER sudo apt-get remove modemmanager -y sudo apt install gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad gstreamer1.0-libav gstreamer1.0-gl -y chmod +x ./QGroundControl.AppImage ./QGroundControl.AppImage

docs.title: QGC Build v4.0
docs.text: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6SGl5S6GpNk&t=9s QGC v4.0 Qt v5.15.0

docs.title: QGC dev guide
docs.text:
https://docs.qgroundcontrol.com/master/en/qgc-dev-guide/getting_started/index.html

Step 1: Setup QT from online https://www.qt.io/download-open-source https://download.qt.io/archive/online_installers/4.7/qt-unified-linux-x64-4.7.0-online.run

./qt-online-installer-linux-x64-4.8.0.run --help | grep mirror Singapore Mirror https://download.qt.io/static/mirrorlist/ ./qt-online-installer-linux-x64-4.8.0.run --mirror https://mirrors.cloud.tencent.com/qt/ https://ubuntu.pkgs.org/22.04/ubuntu-universe-arm64/libxcb-cursor-dev_0.1.1-4ubuntu1_arm64.deb.html

Step 2: Install Additional Packages git clone --recursive -j8 https://github.com/mavlink/qgroundcontrol.git git submodule update --recursive bash ./qgroundcontrol/tools/setup/install-dependencies-debian.sh

docs.title: QT Build
docs.text:
Step 3: Configure QT Project "qgroundcontrol" gcc --version gcc (Ubuntu 12.3.0-1ubuntu1~22.04) 12.3.0

cd DIR/qgroundcontrol git checkout Stable_V4.4 Launch Qt Creator, select Open Project and select the DIR/qgroundcontrol/qgroundcontrol.pro OR DIR/qgroundcontrol/CMakeLists.txt file. Select the appropriate kit for your needs: Ubuntu: Desktop Qt 6.6.3 GCC 64bit Build using the "hammer" icons

Goto Projects > Build & Run > Desktop Qt 5.15 GCC 64bit Double click on Build > Double click on Run

Press Alt + 1 then o to print detailed error

docs.title: Manual build
docs.text:
ls /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake | grep -i qt5 ls /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake | grep -i qt6

dpkg -l | grep qt6- apt-cache search qt5multimedia

  1. Locate Qt6Config.cmake find /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -name "Qt6Config.cmake" tree /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ -L 1

  2. Get Qt package required export QT_PLUGIN_PATH=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt6/plugins cd ~/Downloads/qgc/qgroundcontrol/build cmake /opt/qt5/lib/cmake/ -DQt5_DIR=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/Qt5 .. cmake -DQt6_DIR=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/Qt6 ..

docs.title: Compile QT 5.15.14 Source
docs.text:
https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/gettingstarted.html https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/linux-building.html

https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/ https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/10.0-systemd/x/qt5.html # QT 5.15.0 https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/11.0-systemd/x/qt5.html # QT 5.15.2 https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/11.2-systemd/x/qt5.html # QT 5.15.5 https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/11.3-systemd/x/qt5.html # QT 5.15.8 https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/12.0-systemd/x/qt5.html # QT 5.15.10 https://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs/view/svn/x/qt5-components.html # QT 5.15.14 https://lfs.maru-na.net/patches/downloads/qt-everywhere-opensource-src/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.14-kf5-1.patch

export QT5PREFIX=/opt/qt5 sudo mkdir -pv /opt/qt-5.15.14 sudo ln -sfnv qt-5.15.14 /opt/qt5 patch -Np1 -i ../qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.14-kf5-1.patch mkdir -pv qtbase/.git

ls -Fd qt* | grep / | sed 's/^/-skip /;s@/@@' > tempconf && sed -i -r '/base|tools|x11extras|svg|declarative|wayland/d' tempconf

./configure -prefix $QT5PREFIX -sysconfdir /etc/xdg -confirm-license -opensource -dbus-linked -openssl-linked -system-harfbuzz -system-sqlite -nomake examples -no-rpath -syslog $(cat tempconf)

make; make install; make clean; make distclean;

find /opt/qt5/ -name "*Config.cmake"

export QT5BINDIR=$QT5PREFIX/bin sudo install -v -dm755 /usr/share/pixmaps/ sudo install -v -Dm644 qttools/src/assistant/assistant/images/assistant-128.png /usr/share/pixmaps/assistant-qt5.png sudo install -v -Dm644 qttools/src/designer/src/designer/images/designer.png /usr/share/pixmaps/designer-qt5.png sudo install -v -Dm644 qttools/src/linguist/linguist/images/icons/linguist-128-32.png /usr/share/pixmaps/linguist-qt5.png sudo install -v -Dm644 qttools/src/qdbus/qdbusviewer/images/qdbusviewer-128.png /usr/share/pixmaps/qdbusviewer-qt5.png sudo install -dm755 /usr/share/applications

Finally, Search in Apps Qt 5

docs.title: Install From code.qt.io
docs.text:
git clone https://code.qt.io/qt/qt5.git cd qt5 git checkout 5.15

Update .gitmodules for required components

git submodule # list submodule git config --file .gitmodules --name-only --get-regexp path # get paths git submodule deinit -f -- .qtdocgallery.path

./configure -developer-build -opensource -confirm-license -nomake examples -nomake tests

make -j$(nproc) sudo make install

docs.title: Other guide
docs.text:
https://ubuntu.pkgs.org/22.04/ubuntu-main-amd64/libx11-dev_1.7.5-1_amd64.deb.html http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/libx/libx11/libx11-dev_1.7.5-1_amd64.deb

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PY41CP13p3k https://www.ics.com/blog/how-compile-qt-source-code-linux https://releases.linaro.org/components/toolchain/binaries/latest-7/aarch64-linux-gnu/gcc-linaro-7.5.0-2019.12-x86_64_aarch64-linux-gnu.tar.xz

wget https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/5.15/5.15.3/single/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.3.tar.xz md5sum qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.3.tar.xz a1c893731d6a4500cd08409911b7cb72 qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.3.tar.xz

tar xf qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.3.tar.xz cd qt-everywhere-src-5.15.3

./configure -prefix /usr/local/qt5.15.3 -opensource -confirm-license make -j6 sudo make install ls /usr/local/Qt-5.15.3/bin/designer

make docs sudo make install_docs ls /usr/local/Qt-5.15.3/bin/assistant
